text:
@EricTopol There was one reasonably sized study done in a different patient population (outpatients) suggesting a benefit, albeit effect size small.

Still, agree colchicine is unlikely to have a role in covid treatment. https://t.co/1o9cQN56oI

Wonderful, insightful overview by @DLeonhardt  of how distorted our predictions about Covid19 can be based on the stories we inevitably tell ourselves. 

Doesn't work that way.

Best approach -- humility in the face of this new disease. 
https://t.co/UlsKpxov20
